${modID}:Eitheiruiung.NAME: Eitheiruiung
${modID}:Eitheiruiung.FLAVOR: The "Staff of Balance", formed to channel an endless amount of magic from the Tree of Life.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] [E] at the start of your turn. When you play #b4 or more cards in a turn, you lose #b
HP.

${modID}:FlowCompass.NAME: Flow Compass
${modID}:FlowCompass.FLAVOR: A glass sphere and a black needle move in 3D space, tracing out the harmonics of magic.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play #b
#ySkills, copy the next #ySkill you play.

${modID}:TomeOfTheUnknowable.NAME: Tome of the Unknowable
${modID}:TomeOfTheUnknowable.FLAVOR: A nondescript book that holds the secrets of the world and wishes to share.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add two random cards to your hand.

${modID}:KeyOfDestinies.NAME: Key of Destinies
${modID}:KeyOfDestinies.FLAVOR: A wrought-iron key that controls destiny.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, #yScry

${modID}:Shadowrend.NAME: Shadowrend
${modID}:Shadowrend.FLAVOR: A blade that devours even the soul of its wielder.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you deal unblocked damage, gain #b1 temporary #yStrength.

${modID}:PeaceBranch.NAME: Peace Branch
${modID}:PeaceBranch.FLAVOR: A stick formed from the resolution of a great conflict.
DESCRIPTIONS: When an enemy dies, prevent the next time you would lose HP this combat.

${modID}:BandOfStableTime.NAME: Band of Stable Time
${modID}:BandOfStableTime.FLAVOR: A platinum bracelet that prevents timelines from splitting in its vicinity.
DESCRIPTIONS: You get #b1 #y${modID}:Star at the start of combat. When you are dealt damage, get #b1 #yBlock for each #y${modID}:Star you have.

${modID}:CheapFlowTorch.NAME: Cheap Flow Torch
${modID}:CheapFlowTorch.FLAVOR: "I know we don't have a lot of money right now, but I want to make sure Caelum can grow up into the engineer he wants to be."
DESCRIPTIONS: Once each combat, right-click this to spend #b
gold and gain [E] .

${modID}:WoodenFlute.NAME: Wooden Flute
${modID}:WoodenFlute.FLAVOR: "I can't do much to help Aria with her hunting skill. However, she seems to like music, so I hope she sticks to it."
DESCRIPTIONS: Your first attack each turn deals #b1 damage to ALL enemies for each #y${modID}:Star you have.

${modID}:MeteorHairpin.NAME: Meteor Hairpin
${modID}:MeteorHairpin.FLAVOR: "Silva is growing up to be more than suited for her noble role. Seeing as the shooting star represents luck, I hope this brings luck to her."
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card is #yExhausted, gain #b1 temporary #yStrength.

${modID}:TemporalAnchor.NAME: Temporal Anchor
${modID}:TemporalAnchor.FLAVOR: The activation of the Band of Stable Time locks down its active timeline, preventing (other) time travelers from jumping in unannounced.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yBand #yof #yStable #yTime. NL You get #b3 #y${modID}:Stars at the start of combat. When you are dealt damage, get #b1 #yBlock for each #y${modID}:Star you have.

${modID}:BagOfCarrots.NAME: Bag Of Carrots
${modID}:BagOfCarrots.FLAVOR: Condensed sugar in a crisp orange packet.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time a card is #yExhausted each turn, gain [E] .

${modID}:CrystalKris.NAME: Crystal Kris
${modID}:CrystalKris.FLAVOR: A blade of crystal made to taste only the blood of its creator.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you end a turn with #b
or more #y${modID}:Stars, gain #b1 #yStrength.

${modID}:WorldforgeFragment.NAME: Worldforge Fragment
${modID}:WorldforgeFragment.FLAVOR: A machine capable of casting the Allspell, left in pieces so it couldn't be used a second time.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

${modID}:TranscriptionTablet.NAME: Transcription Tablet
${modID}:TranscriptionTablet.FLAVOR: "Lexi was born without a voice. I gifted this to her, such that she may be able to write one herself."
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a skill without #y${modID}:Constellation, gain #b1 temporary #y${modID}:Star.

${modID}:ModelFighter.NAME: Model Fighter
${modID}:ModelFighter.FLAVOR: "When Arctus left home, he left everything he cared about behind. I hope this model ship finds him well, so he may have something."
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b5 or more cards in a turn, apply #b2 #yVulnerable to ALL enemies.
